sqlMap.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(TRADE_ID),0)+1 AS TRADE_ID FROM RIPPLE_TRADE
INSERT INTO RIPPLE_TRADE (TRADE_ID,TRADE_TYPE,REQUEST_BUY_MONEY,REQUEST_SELL_QTY ,RESULT_UNIT_PRICE,RESULT_QTY,RESULT_TOT_MONEY,FEE ,STATUS,REQUEST_DT,REQUEST_ER_ID , REQUEST_QTY , REQUEST_MONEY , PRODUCT_TYPE , PAYMENT_CURRENCY ) VALUES ( #tradeId#, #tradeType#, #requestBuyMoney#, #requestSellQty#, #resultUnitPrice#, #resultQty# , #resultTotMoney#, #fee#, 'N', SYSDATE(), #requestErId# , #requestQty#, #requestMoney#, #productType#, #paymentCurrency# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT IFNULL(sum(REQUEST_BUY_MONEY),0) as REQUEST_BUY_MONEY, IFNULL(sum(REQUEST_SELL_QTY), 0) as REQUEST_SELL_QTY FROM RIPPLE_TRADE WHERE REQUEST_ER_ID = #requestErId# AND STATUS = 'N'

SELECT TRADE_ID,TRADE_TYPE,REQUEST_BUY_MONEY,REQUEST_SELL_QTY ,RESULT_UNIT_PRICE,RESULT_QTY,RESULT_TOT_MONEY,FEE ,STATUS,REQUEST_DT,REQUEST_ER_ID, UPDATE_DT, UPDATE_ER_ID ,MEMBER.MBER_NM AS MBER_NM ,MEMBER.RIPPLE_TRADE_ID AS RIPPLE_TRADE_ID ,MEMBER.RIPPLE_TRADE_EMAIL AS RIPPLE_TRADE_EMAIL ,MEMBER.DUM_POINT_CARD_NO AS DUM_POINT_CARD_NO , REQUEST_QTY AS REQUEST_QTY , REQUEST_MONEY AS REQUEST_MONEY , PRODUCT_TYPE AS PRODUCT_TYPE , PAYMENT_CURRENCY AS PAYMENT_CURRENCY FROM RIPPLE_TRADE TRADE JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER MEMBER ON TRADE.REQUEST_ER_ID = MEMBER.MBER_ID WHERE TRADE.TRADE_ID = #tradeId#

SELECT TRADE_ID, TRADE_TYPE, IFNULL(REQUEST_BUY_MONEY, 0) AS REQUEST_BUY_MONEY, IFNULL(REQUEST_SELL_QTY, 0) AS REQUEST_SELL_QTY ,IFNULL(RESULT_UNIT_PRICE, 0) AS RESULT_UNIT_PRICE, IFNULL(RESULT_QTY, 0) AS RESULT_QTY, IFNULL(RESULT_TOT_MONEY, 0) AS RESULT_TOT_MONEY, IFNULL(FEE, 0) AS FEE ,STATUS,REQUEST_DT,REQUEST_ER_ID, UPDATE_DT, UPDATE_ER_ID ,MEMBER.MBER_NM AS MBER_NM ,MEMBER.MBTLNUM AS MBTLNUM ,MEMBER.RIPPLE_TRADE_ID AS RIPPLE_TRADE_ID ,MEMBER.RIPPLE_TRADE_EMAIL AS RIPPLE_TRADE_EMAIL ,MEMBER.DUM_POINT_CARD_NO AS DUM_POINT_CARD_NO , REQUEST_QTY AS REQUEST_QTY , REQUEST_MONEY AS REQUEST_MONEY , PRODUCT_TYPE AS PRODUCT_TYPE , PAYMENT_CURRENCY AS PAYMENT_CURRENCY FROM RIPPLE_TRADE TRADE JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER MEMBER ON TRADE.REQUEST_ER_ID = MEMBER.MBER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND TRADE.TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType#
AND TRADE.REQUEST_ER_ID = #requestErId#
ORDER BY TRADE.TRADE_ID DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(TRADE_ID) FROM RIPPLE_TRADE TRADE WHERE 1=1
AND TRADE.TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType#
AND TRADE.REQUEST_ER_ID = #requestErId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RIPPLE_TRADE SET RESULT_UNIT_PRICE = #resultUnitPrice#, RESULT_QTY = #resultQty#, RESULT_TOT_MONEY = #resultTotMoney#, FEE = #fee#, STATUS = #status#, UPDATE_ER_ID = #updateErId#, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE TRADE_ID = #tradeId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DEPOSIT AS deposit , XRP_DEPOSIT AS xrpDeposit , CHARGE AS charge FROM RIPPLE_MEMBER_ACCOUNT WHERE MBER_ID = #mberId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO RIPPLE_ACCOUNT_TRANSACTIONS ( TRADE_TYPE , TRANSACTION_MONEY , REQUEST_ID , CHARGE , STATUS , REQUEST_DT , FEE ) VALUES ( #tradeType# , #transactionsMoney# , #mberId# , #tradeCharge# , #status# , SYSDATE() , #fee# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT TA.* FROM( SELECT T.*, (@rownum := @rownum +1) AS RANK FROM ( SELECT TRADE_ID , CASE WHEN TRADE_TYPE = 'D' THEN '예탁' ELSE '인출' END as tradeType , TRANSACTION_MONEY as transactionsMoney , REQUEST_ID AS requestId , CHARGE AS tradeCharge , B.CODE_NM AS status , FEE AS fee , date_format(REQUEST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS requestDt , date_format(TRADE_COMPLETE_DT, '%Y %m %d') AS tradeCompleteDt , REMARK AS remark FROM ripple_account_transactions A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CODE_NM , A.CODE FROM comtccmmndetailcode A INNER JOIN comtccmmncode B ON A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID WHERE B.CODE_ID ='RIP904' ) B ON A.STATUS = B.CODE ORDER BY REQUEST_DT DESC ) T, ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) R ) TA WHERE RANK < 4

SELECT TA.* FROM( SELECT T.*, (@rownum := @rownum +1) AS RANK FROM ( SELECT TRADE_ID , CASE WHEN TRADE_TYPE = 'S' THEN '구매' ELSE '판매' END as tradeType , ifnull(REQUEST_MONEY, 0) AS requestMoney , REQUEST_QTY AS requestQty , PRODUCT_TYPE AS productType , B.CODE_NM AS status , ifnull(FEE, 0) AS fee , date_format(REQUEST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS requestDt , PAYMENT_CURRENCY AS paymentCurrency , MEMBER.MBER_NM AS MBER_NM FROM RIPPLE_TRADE TRADE INNER JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER MEMBER ON TRADE.REQUEST_ER_ID = MEMBER.MBER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CODE_NM , A.CODE FROM comtccmmndetailcode A INNER JOIN comtccmmncode B ON A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID WHERE B.CODE_ID ='RIP904' ) B ON TRADE.STATUS = B.CODE WHERE REQUEST_ER_ID = #requestErId# ORDER BY TRADE_ID DESC ) T, ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) R ) TA WHERE RANK < 6
